dct_title_s: Planisphaerium terrestre cum utroque coelesti hemisphaerio ... =
dct_description_sm: California shown as a labeled island with an indented northern coast. Nova Albion and P. to Draco labeled at north end.
Surrounded by two celestial maps, 26 astronomical and geographical diagrams, and illustrations.
Issued in Pieter Schenk's Atlas Contractus.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
